isis.stitle: ANTILOCK TRACTION CONTROL RELAY VALVE: BENDIX ATR-2 - OPERATION AND LEAKAGE TESTS

svcproc.title: GENERAL
svcproc.para: A change in vehicle braking characteristics or a low pressure warning may indicate a malfunction in one or the other brake circuit, and although the vehicle air brake system may continue to function, the vehicle should not be operated until the necessary repairs have been made and both braking circuits, including the pneumatic and mechanical devices are operating normally. Always check the vehicle brake system for proper operation after performing brake work and before returning the vehicle to service.
To properly test the function of the ATR-2, a pair of test gauges or gauges of known accuracy must be used.
